title: Negroni
description: A classic Italian cocktail made with gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari.

title: Aperol Spritz
description: A refreshing cocktail made with Aperol, Prosecco, and soda water.

title: Limoncello
description: A sweet and tangy lemon liqueur, usually served chilled as a digestif.

title: Peroni Nastro Azzurro
description: A popular Italian lager beer, with a crisp and refreshing taste.

title: Chianti Classico
description: A dry and fruity red wine, made from Sangiovese grapes grown in the Chianti region of Tuscany.
